Items.text: The cell is now affected by 'Integrity Exotrons'.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: This type of exotron gives cells super strength or durability.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: Superheroes that have been affected by these exotrons have bodies that can exhibit superhuman levels of strength or toughness.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: The cell now has the strength to defeat the villain cell.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: Although, you must do it quickly. The effects from the exotron beam wear off over time.
Items.name: Ms Sparks

Items.text: Press Z to punch with an Integrity Powered Cell
